name: Emily Ha
text: Really enjoy the open outdoor patio. Great place to bring the family and service is good. The pacific rim pizza is awesome, too! I like how they make the pizzas extra cheesy. You will def be taking leftovers home bc their large is huge, ‚Ä¶More

name: Ashley Scroggins
text: Came here with a friend for lunch and it was not busy at all which was good for us. We had to leave our contact information for COVID-19 purposes, the menu(s) is a digital scan except for the brunch menu, and table/booths were blocked off ‚Ä¶More

name: Gary Jones
text: A little slow service, but busy night!  Pizza was great!

name: Lily Chapman
text: This is by far the absolute BEST mellow mushroom that I've ever been to. I've gone to MM all over, from Florida all the way to Tennessee. I never knew the food was supposed to be this good. The tempeh hoagie was amazing! The beer cheese dip ‚Ä¶More

name: Curtis Johnson
text: Food was great and the service was even better. I enjoyed it

name: Chad Robertson
text: Great pizza as always and we sat outside with our dogs!!! Was a great evening.

name: Tammy Doll
text: The food is always delicious at any Mellow Mushroom you may visit. I love how each MM has its own style. One of my favorite places to eat!

name: Katie Jackson
text: Great service and great atmosphere. AMAZING pizza!

name: Adriel James
text: Was greeted and seated immediately but it took our server 5-7 minutes to come speak to us.   It was probably that he had a large party because the rest of the time he was very attentive and checked in on us frequently.  Had the Mel's Deluxe ‚Ä¶More

name: Mark Irving
text: The pizza is really good and they do have glutten free pizza which is quite tasty as well. Only negative is that it can be a little pricey

name: Britny Thissen
text: Amazing food! Great service. Awesome decor. Highly recommend

name: Tom Thissen
text: Delicious pizza. Fast and friendly service. Staff is very helpful at making recommendations. Everything recommended was as delicious as they said it would be.

name: Sonia Wade
text: The pizza was the worse I've ever eaten. The dough was soft & the pizza was nasty.

name: Joe Reed
text: Food was great. Calzones and cheese bread. Great looking Brunch items. Waitress was awesome. We had a large group that showed up in two waves and she was great.

name: Jackee B
text: I must say that the vegan pizza was really good but i wish the onions on the pizza was chopped alot smaller. Overall I was pleasantly satisfied.

name: Dale Miller
text: Great food , kept very clean, good distance between tables and Jourdan took great care of us. And everyone was masked.

name: Nesha Dior
text: Me and my family attended Mellow Mushroom today for my littles brothers birthday, we got there at 6:05 and left at 8:00 without eating ! Because we didn‚Äôt receive any food Only drinks! Different parties of people entered During our visit ‚Ä¶More

name: Tamara Rivera
text: The best pizza in town! They have the best atmosphere too!. I love the calzone and spinach salad too! They now have several flavors of adult slushies that are out of this world delicious!

name: Christopher Delance
text: Went here to grab a small pizza for lunch. I was drawn in by the name. So ordered online, and picked up in store. From the very quick experience I had inside, it seemed like a fun place to eat. The bar area has a few tv‚Äôs and a decent ‚Ä¶More

name: Jon Rittenhouse
text: This is a great place to go alone or with a group. Their pizas are amazing. The crust on their calzones is light and fluffy. The atmosphere is fun. The people here are very nice and friendly. I will be back for sure.

name: Anna Yarkovsky
text: Awesome place to go for a quick dinner. The staff are wonderful, and the food is amazing. We love the pretzel bites and the mighty meaty calzone. In the summer we like to sit on our patio and bring our dog! They always have a water bowl for her.

name: Brandy Marek
text: Food was great.  Service was eh.  But as always, they are slow as molasses!  I have been multiple times and I've never had a great experience.   Guess I should stop trying.

name: neota howard
text: Excellent, I had a thin crust buffalo chicken pizza that was scrumptious. Highly recommendedüòã

name: Stacie Carlson
text:
Have you never been here? What are you waiting for? Go now! Their pizza is out of this world!!
I ordered half House and the other half Holy Shiitake. Still not sure which one ‚Ä¶More

name: Jeffrey Cockrell
text: People tell me all of the time, you're too hard on the restaurant reviews, I say that I am just being honest. So here we go..mellow mushroom is a chain restaurant so they look mostly a like,  the menus are about the same,  so no surprises ‚Ä¶More

name: john fakouri
text: Great staff great food

name: Tia Hurley
text: They are always good food and great service. Love the handling of social distancing.

name: Ziggy Mulava
text: I ordered cheese and house special pizza for delivery.  My two teenage grandchildren tried them and refuse to eat.  One of the worst pizzas I ever tried.

name: Michael Goldrup
text: The best pizza in the world! I love this place

name: Bill Giles
text: Offer curbside delivery but they wont answer the phone when u call. Make u come inside to pick up. Not socially responsible

text: Great place. Do get there for Monday mania. Quiz and trivia night along with great pizza üçï and drinks üç∏

name: Matt Endres
text: Always stop when in Memphis area.  Great pizzas.

text: We went for appetizers between lunch & dinner.. service was a little slow but looked like one waiter had all the tables, so he was doing all he could. Staff was friendly and the apps were good

name: Zin Girl
text: Great food options rather you are vegan, vegetarian, or meat lover

name: Pam Schneider
text: Service was great. Pizza was good. Pretzel rolls delicious. Could have been a bit cleaner in the restaurant area.

name: Joe Ricker
text: We had a birthday party here for our daughters. The food was great and service by our waitress Autumn was fantastic! They were very accommodating and helpful from planning to execution. I was very impressed. I would recommend this location for personal or business party/gatherings.

name: Mike Heverly
text: Doughy, undercooked stromboli. Otherwise good service and clean restaurant

name: Rohith Kumar
text: Pizza here is good I would like to recommend any one who wants personalized pizza

name: mike mahar
text: Great people, very helpful and kind. Service was prompt.

name: Carey Grant
text: Waited almost 2 hours for pizza and 45 minutes for drinks. Ridiculous

name: Tom Laughner

name: Adam Gray
text: Great service and food, as usual from this chain!

name: Neal B.
text: Made it just how I wanted it. Taste great

name: mamaknight05
text: Delicious food, great service. We appreciate having an option for our son who cannot have gluten or dairy. He loves his pizza from Mellow Mushroom!

text: Amazing pizza an awesome father daughter  date. So awesome I think I'll bring the entire familia back today too!

name: RA reacts
text: Great food, great service.

name: Gabby Gomez
text: The previous time we've been here, the pizza has been fantastic. Today it was just too greasy,salty, and chewy. Great ambient and fast service. Overall, great place.

name: Ralph Farr
text: I had a great meal at the Germantown Mellow Mushroom. I ordered the Veg Out pizza and it was delicious! My server was very friendly and helpful. I recommend you give it a try.

name: Kami Mullins
text: Pizza for days! Even some cool shirts

name: Jessica Kuhn
text: Giving three stars because we had a positive first experience in the past, however tonight we were disappointed. Our pizza took a long time to come out and when it finally did, it looked great but after cutting in we found the crust soggy, undercooked and unappetizing.

name: Clari Fynn
text: Very interesting wallpaper. Food was really good. Was not expecting a really good and huge portion of their calzone.

name: Latara Meadows
text: One of the best pizza spots in the city. Our server was superb! Love this location!

name: Scott Allman
text: On par with other Mellow Mushrooms I‚Äôve experienced. Good food, service and cleanliness. Only downside is that this location certainly doesn‚Äôt have some of the individuality the other MM locations I‚Äôve been to have. In saying that, it does have an amazing and beautiful tree sculpture out front within the outdoor seating.

name: Platypus Dara
text: My sister, brother in law, and I visited the mellow mushroom yesterday evening for dinner. The atmosphere was great, very chill. Our server was quite friendly. We didn't order a pizza, but we each got sandwiches. I got the burger and the roasted potatoes that came with it were really really delicious!

name: Daniel Manning
text: In the immortal words of Jim Halpert: "You've always left me satisfied.."

name: Mandy Stone
text: Food was great! Service was very lacking. Def not worth it.

name: Eyvette Russom
text: Food was good but prefer the east Memphis location. The atmosphere is a bit more 60ish. Nothing wrong with service or food at all just the music and everything else. Still a good place

name: Michael Sims
text: Okay, we have tried it three times. Terrible service, and the Server kept ignoring me. I had to get up and ask the person that seated us for sweetener as there was none on the tables. Did not get refills on tea, so the Server did not get a ‚Ä¶More

name: WM
text: Delicious pizza and great service!  Love that kids eat free on Thursday!

name: Jan C.
text: My fav pizza place!!  I had a small meatball thin crust pizza and it was more than I could eat!! It was just as yummy reheated the next day for lunch.  Service and location were both terrific!

name: Mike Robinson
text: The food was decent but took a long time to come out.

name: Jay Campbell
text: NEVER disappointed! The pizza. The apps. The beer cheese. Always an amazing experience.

name: Sean Abel
text: Awesome pizza and salads with great beer selections! A variety of others items on the menu. Very hip and friendly vibe at the Mellon Mushroom!!

name: Jesse Hollingsworth
text: Delicious pizza and a good takeout experience.

name: Ed Parra
text: Took me back to back in the day with good pizza.  The service was great compared to the bad service from other pizza places in Memphis.  A must stop place to get good pizza.

name: Misty Tadder
text: Server was nice but it took 2 hours to get our food. When we arrived we were the only guests. The entire restaurant filled up and had their food before we were served. The bread on my sandwich was hard but it tasted really good.

name: Jeanne Gustafson
text: I love their crust. Service is good. Warehouse type building makes it a very loud place.

name: Tony G
text: Best pizza in Memphis.  Clean and friendly environment.  Awesome spinach salad.

name: michael epperson
text: Definite positive vibe with delish pizza along with thirst quenching adult juice!

name: Gayle James

name: Mark L
text: Service was bad. Nats flying around and getting in our food and drinks. Food was subpar. Ive ate here a few years ago and it was alot better. Dont waste your money here.

name: benjamin Stevens
text: Food was good. My sister is in town. I took my daughter and sister there for dinner. They enjoyed it. Try this resturant won't you.

text:
Good service and pizza

name: Rosalind Guy

name: B G
text: Mellow Mushroom has some of the best pizza I have ever tasted!!!

name: Joe Fawcett3
text: Great service, good food, fun atmosphere.

name: Nicholas Matlock
text: Probably the best dough you can find at a pizza restaurant. Honestly I could probably just eat a pizza of nothing but dough. If it is your first time then make sure you try the cosmic karma.

name: J W
text: One of our favorite restaurants where the food and service are always good. Tonight we went for Mother's Day dinner and my small kids were both super fussy. The wonderful hostess and waitress both went above and beyond in trying to accommodate us, so I could enjoy my evening. Thank you doesn't fully cover my gratitude.

name: Jason Smith
text: Mellow Mushroom is unique from there numerous different types of pizzas to their large selection of beer on tap. I highly recommend trying Mellow Mushroom at least once so you can experience their unique take on a regular pizza joint.

name: Abigail Perez
text: Great service. Wonderful food. I've been to this specific Mellow Mushroom before and I've never been disappointed. This place is a MUST if your craving pizza or a calzone.

text: Food is great. Lots of annoying teenage staff so when it gets busy wait time is loooooong. Other than that it's great!

name: Morgan Jones
text: Food was good, like always. It was just very busy and took a while to get the food and had to ask multiple times for a refill. The staff is very nice and you can tell they are working hard trying to take care of everyone.

name: Sal Canzone

name: John Davis
text: Pizza was fantastic we came during slow part of the afternoon.  Service was on top of everything, drinks were kept full. Made sure that we had everything needed.The supreme pizza had lots of toppings crust was excellent.

name: Valerie Monismith
text: Good food and service.  Vegetarian, vegan and gluten free options!  I love their crust!  Good menu options.  They sometimes have live music or trivia.  There is a small bar area if you are eating out on your own.  Very friendly and comfortable place.  Kid friendly with high chairs.

text: Great food and fantastical service üíôüíôüíô

text: Just a great place to grab some pizza a hoagie wonderful appetizers, or hit the bar for one of 100+ different beers, join the Beer Club. Really love the separation between the bar area and the restaurant creates a family environment and a sports bar environment in one space. Well done Steve and family.

name: Andrea Kearney
text: Order is always accurate. Friendly staff great service. I come here often and never had any issues. The food taste great. Today I got the Enlightened salad and pepperoni pizza. Scrumptious..

name: Wayne Warren
text: Food was good.  We had an attentive server.  We wanted something with a different atmosphere than our usual fast pace lunches.  Has sports shows playing so you glance at the tvs between conversations.  Music playing was pleasing to us.  Little pricey, but good meal.

name: Tamekia Black
text: Really Good! Unfortunately, the Olive Branch location was closed down.  So I have to drive to Germantown to get pizza... it's worth the drive though.

name: Brian Richey

text: Not really a fan of Mellow Mushroom's in general. This one is similar to the rest. The idea of Mellow Mushroom is great. In reality, the place seems drab and less than friendly. The food is good...the staff is sometimes friendly and sometimes preoccupied with something else.

name: Andrew Heckle
text: Was in there recently. All I ordered was a small 2 topping pizza and it was almost an hour before it was ready. The staff did not think I had the right to be annoyed.

name: Sameer Shah
text: Huge tap beer selection! Food was awesome. They have a lot more than just pizza. I had the jerk chicken hoagie the half size was huge and plenty for one person. Tessa at the bar was very kind and attentive. I would definitely recommend it to others and will definitely be back.

name: Kim Elish
text: Pizza and pretzels..... yummy! Our waitress Deedee was AMAZING!!

name: Ron Lewis
text: Server was cheerful and pizza & beer hit the spot.

name: John Cockrell
text: been here a couple times... kinda expensive for the pizza you get

name: Melinda Norris
text: Service was great. Food was yummy. Excellent place to eat.

name: Jamie Roszel
text: It isn't "local," but I've always loved Mellow Mushroom. The beer selection is great, their dough is fantastic, and the service is always reliable. It also has a quirky ambience that I've always enjoyed. I just love this place!

name: Scott Allman
text: Service is outstanding. They're also flexible enough to allow my family to have the same great server every visit. Vegetarian friendly with additional options for the Gluten Free crowd. Good setting for children and families!

name: Gina Lowers
text: Always great service, great draft beer and even better pizza!

name: Ellen Stevens
text: Dennis the bartender is top notch. Salads are huge and so good. Order a half in a large bowl. Will not be disappointed.

name: Jason Connor
text: Atmosphere was nice & pizza was good. Took 5 minutes to recieve my first beer & over 10 minutes for the second. Nice list of craft beers, just be prepared to wait a while even on a non-busy night.

name: Sarah Lin
text: AWESOME place for a fun meal with family, friends or both!  Very kid friendly!  Our go to are the pretzel bites!!! Yummmmm

The noise of the blowers was the only negative I could come up with.
